_sText:
Have fun!

A routine day at the prison. Or so you thought. Rumour is that a prisoner has escaped, find him.
You can lock dangerous prisoners in the Confession Cell located on the lower floor to make sure they dont rebel. 

Terrorists:
Kill the Counter-Terrorist Guards and escape the prison!

Counter-Terrorists:
Arm yourself, these people were locked up for a reason, and now they are trying to escape.
Count up the prisoners and send out search parties to bring back any who have escaped.
Warn the criminals that if you are attacked, you will shoot to kill.

***BETA VERSION***

by Avenger 

-Please note this map is still under construction!!!
